actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Trade Commission Act to prohibit the Federal Trade Commission from requiring any person, partnership, or corporation to file line of business reports.

summary.text: Provides, under the Federal Trade Commission Act, that the Federal Trade Commission shall not require any person, partnership, or corporation to file line of business reports.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Trade Commission Act to prohibit the Federal Trade Commission from requiring any person, partnership, or corporation to file line of business reports.
